body: “Thank goodness for Stept. We’ve come to them with short deadlines, tight budgets, scripts with babies and dogs all over the place and they’ve never batted an eye. Plus, the work has always turned out better than we ever imagined. The people at Stept are lovely and the work they do is lovely. It’s a great combo.”
name: Catherine Kennedy

body: “There are film crews who do the job, and then there are crews like the team at Stept who actually go above and beyond to bring a project to life and set it apart. They don’t settle for good enough. And on top of all that, they’re just good people to be around.”
name: Chasen Marshall

body: “A great story deserves a great storyteller, and in our experience the creative collective at Stept Studios has been just that. Stept puts the most passionate and driven talent at your fingertips, and they will go to any length to make your vision a reality.”
name: Josh Saunders

body: “At The North Face we often need high quality, creative edits with a fast turn around time and an affordable price tag. We look for production companies who can not only fulfill that need, but are flexible, responsive and professional. Stept has been all of the above, and have exceeded our expectations throughout the creative process.”
name: Blair Witte
